resources.string: Visit http://app.mensageiro.info to add this phone to your account.
Registering\nPlease wait a moment, contacting Mensageiro to register your device.
Connecting Google Account\n\nThis may take a few minutes. Make sure you are connected to the internet and have an active Google account on your device.
Contacting Mensageiro\n\nWe are contacting the Mensageiro server to remove this device from your account.
You have sent SENT / CAPACITY messages in the past MINUTES minutes.
You have sent SENT / CAPACITY messages in the past MINUTES minutes. When you reach your sending capacity sending will pause due to Android limits.
You have sent SENT / CAPACITY messages in the past MINUTES minutes. Messages sending will now pause because of Android limits.
Tap here to install a message pack to increase your capacity. You can install PACKS_REMAINING more packPACKS_PLURAL.
You have installed the maximum number of packs. If you need more, please contact join@rapidpro.io.
Mensageiro is active and relaying messages to your account. Tap to pause im3nsa.
Mensageiro is paused and will not relay messages to your account. Tap to resume im3nsa.
Mensageiro is unable to connect to the internet. Make sure you are connected to WiFi and that your mobile data is enabled. If problems persist, try rebooting your device.

Mensageiro is experiencing problems sending SMS messages. This may be a temporary problem with your network or may be an indication that your SIM is out of credit. Messages will be retried, but if problems persist, check your phone\'s credit or try rebooting your device.
In order to use the Android SMS Channel, all requested permissions need to be granted. Click here to try again.
Allows the app to send messages
Allows the app to start its services
To ensure the best possible experience, click here to make sure battery optimizations for im3nsa are turned off.
Nice work! You are one step away.
